item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, March 6, 2025 at 5:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Show HN: CodeTracer – A new time-traveling debugger implemented in Nim and Rust (142 points | 28 comments)
2. Sayonara, R35: Nissan Japan has stopped taking orders for the GT-R (57 points | 43 comments)
3. Age and cognitive skills: Use it or lose it (370 points | 197 comments)
4. More thoughts on the 1670 modem's weird noises (9 points | discuss)
5. Revolt: Open-Source Alternative to Discord (432 points | 308 comments)
6. Leaping AI (YC W25) Is Hiring Founding Engineers for Self-Improving Voice AI ( | hide)
7. Launch HN: Cenote (YC W25) – Back Office Automation for Medical Clinics (14 points | 5 comments)
8. On the criteria to be used in decomposing systems into modules (1972) (69 points | 14 comments)
9. Anime fans stumbled upon a mathematical proof (24 points | 5 comments)
10. Beavers Are Coming Home (55 points | 38 comments)
11. Game Theory and Settling the Debts of the Deceased in Ancient Times (20 points | 2 comments)
12. Cognitive Behaviors That Enable Self-Improving Reasoners (208 points | 67 comments)
13. GoStringUngarbler: Deobfuscating Strings in Garbled Binaries (22 points | 12 comments)
14. QwQ-32B: Embracing the Power of Reinforcement Learning (396 points | 121 comments)
15. Apache iceberg the Hadoop of the modern-data-stack? (69 points | 39 comments)
16. Zentool – AMD Zen Microcode Manipulation Utility (200 points | 54 comments)
17. Scientists crack how aspirin might stop cancers from spreading (80 points | 34 comments)
18. Yoke: Infrastructure as code, but actually (117 points | 117 comments)
19. Tiny Ten DSP-Based HF Transceiver (50 points | 10 comments)
20. Apple M3 Ultra (1005 points | 942 comments)
21. HYTRADBOI 2025 Conference Postmortem (62 points | 8 comments)
22. Automatically tagging politician when they use their phone on the livestreams (228 points | 126 comments)
23. Nebu: A Spreadsheet Editor for Varvara (109 points | 12 comments)
24. Solving First Order Differential Equations with Julia (111 points | 30 comments)
25. Things we've learned about building products (280 points | 88 comments)
26. Math Academy pulled me out of the Valley of Despair (192 points | 140 comments)
27. Exploring the Paramilitary Leaks (205 points | 130 comments)
28. Show HN: Beating Pokemon Red with RL and <10M Parameters (162 points | 62 comments)
29. Apple takes UK to court over 'backdoor' order (592 points | 221 comments)
30. The Tiny Star Explosions Powering Moore's Law (115 points | 13 comments)
